actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution relating to the continuance in office of judges of inferior courts.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Limits the tenure of judges of inferior Federal courts to ten years, unless a presidential nomination for a continuance in office meets with Senate approval.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution relating to the continuance in office of judges of inferior courts.
